DOC.detailed_description: The short-term effect ( 4 hour intake ) rye crisp bread subjective appetite metabolism evaluate use randomize cross-over study design . Each participant consume three different breakfast consist two different rye crisp bread one wheat crisp bread three different occasion separate 1 week wash-out period . Participants rate subjective appetite ( satiety , hunger desire eat ) use visual analogue scale ( VAS ) every 30 min 4-hour period , start 30 min breakfast . Blood sample collect breakfast regular interval throughout day analysis glucose , insulin hormone level . Gastric empty rate also evaluate use paracetamol indicator . Glucose hormonal response related subjective appetite difference composition breakfast .
